force_direct.f90

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 !  ====================================================================
00002 !
00003 !                              FORCE_DIRECT
00004 !
00005 !   Direct PP force sum for error estimates
00006 !
00007 !  ====================================================================
00008 
00009 subroutine force_direct(n,ntest,x,y,z,q, list, eps, const, ex, ey, ez, pot)
00010   implicit none
00011   real, intent(in) :: eps, const
00012   integer, intent(in) :: n, ntest
00013   integer, intent(in), dimension(n) :: list 
00014   real*8, intent(in), dimension(n) :: x, y, z, q  ! coords and charge 
00015   real*8,  dimension(ntest) :: ex, ey, ez, pot  ! fields and potential to return
00016 
00017   real :: eps2, d, d3, dx, dy, dz
00018   integer :: i,j,k
00019 !  write (*,*) 'Direct sum params: ',eps,const
00020 !  write (*,'(a10,a20/(i6,4f15.3))') 'DIRECT | ','Initial buffers: ',(i, x(i), y(i), z(i), q(i),i=1,n) 
00021  eps2=eps**2
00022   ex(1:ntest) = 0.
00023   ey(1:ntest) = 0.
00024   ez(1:ntest) = 0.
00025   pot(1:ntest) = 0.
00026 
00027   !  PP contribution from simulation volume
00028 
00029   do  k=1,ntest
00030      i=list(k)
00031 !     write (*,*) i,'x_i=',x(i)
00032      do  j=1,n
00033         if (j.ne.i) then
00034            dx=x(i)-x(j)
00035            dy=y(i)-y(j)
00036            dz=z(i)-z(j)
00037            d=sqrt(dx**2+dy**2+dz**2+eps2)
00038            d3=d**3
00039            ex(k) = ex(k) + const*q(j)*dx/d3
00040            ey(k) = ey(k) + const*q(j)*dy/d3
00041            ez(k) = ez(k) + const*q(j)*dz/d3
00042            pot(k) = pot(k) + const*q(j)/d
00043 !          write (*,'(i5,a5,f12.3,a5,f12.3,a5,f12.3)') j,'q_j=',q(j),' x_j=',x(j), ' d=',d
00044         endif
00045      end do
00046   end do
00047 
00048 
00049 end subroutine force_direct
